definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Dad clapped him on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸拍了拍吉米的肩膀。

sentences.english: Ray just broke Reggie's NBA 3-point record this season.
sentences.chinese: 雷阿伦在该赛季刚刚打破了雷吉米勒的三分球记录。

sentences.english: Jamie was going to walk along the top of the wall but he chickened out at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 吉米打算沿着墙顶上走，但是在最后时刻他怯退了。

sentences.english: On April 1, Thornburgh accompanied President Jimmy Carter on a tour of Three Mile Island.
sentences.chinese: 4月1日，索恩伯勒陪同总统吉米卡特视察了三里岛。

sentences.english: Jamie glowered at his smirking brother.
sentences.chinese: 吉米生气地瞪着正在傻笑的哥哥。

sentences.english: Jimmy swallowed the medicine and made a face.
sentences.chinese: 吉米吞下药后扮了个苦相。

sentences.english: "Jimmy, " he said, "I have something to tell you.
sentences.chinese: “吉米，”他说，“我有件事要告诉你。

sentences.english: Jimmy coughed and choked on a piece of sausage.
sentences.chinese: 正吃着香肠的吉米听到这个消息被呛得连声咳嗽。

sentences.english: Zhang, this is Jimmy calling from Polaroid Company.
sentences.chinese: 这是宝丽莱公司的吉米给你打电话。

sentences.english: Jimmie had but a vague idea of world conditions now.
sentences.chinese: 吉米对当今世界情况只有一点模糊的了解。

sentences.english: Back at Jimi’s centre we eat lunch and meet some local politicians.
sentences.chinese: 回到吉米的办公室，我们吃了中饭并见了几位政治家。

sentences.english: Jimmy brings May a glass of orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 吉米给阿美拿来了一杯橙汁。

sentences.english: Linda could have her own horse, and Jimmy could go hunting and fishing with his father.
sentences.chinese: 琳达可以有她自己的马，吉米能和父亲打猎和钓鱼。

sentences.english: The buff guy is my friend Jimmy, he is a coach of a fitness club.
sentences.chinese: 那个壮汉是我的吉米，他是一家健身俱乐部的教练。

sentences.english: Jimmy went to explore while Tommy unpacked the food.
sentences.chinese: 准备食物的当儿，吉米去探险。

sentences.english: Though Jimmy agreed to go at once, Jumbo refused to move.
sentences.chinese: 虽然吉米同意马上就走，但江伯却拒绝移动。

definition: Pelé (1940-), Edson Arantes Do Nascimento, Brazilian football star
Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005
